full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Project Title:** Rental and Installation of Outdoor Tents and Temporary Floors
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017451
**Solicitation Number:** 10212437
**Publication Date:** December 21, 2022

The Canadian Heritage (PCH) is seeking up to two (2) standing offers for the rental and installation of outdoor tents and temporary floors in the National Capital Region. The standing offers will be for a three (3) year period with the possibility of extending by two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**

1. Offerors must provide details and descriptions of at least three projects completed within the last five years, demonstrating their experience and ability to provide all-weather tent and temporary floor rentals.
2. The offeror must certify the capacity to respond to emergencies within four hours and complete all necessary actions to report to the project authority.

**Terms and Conditions:**
* The selected event locations must be within the National Capital Region.
* Offerors must provide all necessary documentation and specifications to support their applications.
* PCH reserves the right to negotiate any of the terms and conditions.

**Notice of Extension:**
An amendment has been made to the original solicitation notice. Please refer to the attached document for more information.

**Attachments:**

* [10212437_questionsresponses-reponses_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/09/3ce19c1da4f43ccc0517a2ef6c9a6b28/)
* [10212437_rfso_rental_tents_and_floors.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/21/d151cf7dd36db0ed7fdcff96e9d97807/)

**Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM
**Contact Information:**
Gregory Yarema, contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca

Note: The vendors will need to respond to the attached documents and submit a complete application package to be considered for this opportunity. The deadline for submission is February 15, 2023. 

This construction project is open to eligible companies from around the world, with no geographic restrictions. This call for offers targets the Canadian Defense Department. This project aims to provide a professional and sustainable event service with options for both permanent
